class.name: OfferingEntity
class.comment: Storage of the offerings which is required by the SOS. An offering is used in SOS to group records according to specific criteria. In the INSPIRE context, an offering is an "INSPRE spatial dataset," an identifiable collection of spatial data.

column.name: offering_id
column.comment: PK column of the table

column.name: identifier
column.comment: Unique identifier of the offering which can be used for filtering. Should be a URI, UUID. E.g. http://www.example.org/123, 123-321.

column.name: fk_identifier_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the offering identifier, reference to the codespace table.

column.name: name
column.comment: The human readable name of the offering.

column.name: fk_name_codespace_id
column.comment: The codespace of the offering name, reference to the codespace table.

column.name: description
column.comment: A short description of the offering

column.name: sampling_time_start
column.comment: The minimum samplingTimeStart of all observation that belong to this offering. If the column is empty, the information is calculated during the cache update and stored locally. Used for the capabilities of the SOS.

column.name: sampling_time_end
column.comment: The maximum samplingTimeStart of all observation that belong to this offering. If the column is empty, the information is calculated during the cache update and stored locally. Used for the capabilities of the SOS.

column.name: result_time_start
column.comment: The minimum resultTimeStart of all observation that belong to this offering. If the column is empty, the information is calculated during the cache update and stored locally. Used for the capabilities of the SOS.

column.name: result_time_end
column.comment: The maximum resultTimeEnd of all observation that belong to this offering. If the column is empty, the information is calculated during the cache update and stored locally. Used for the capabilities of the SOS.

column.name: valid_time_start
column.comment: The minimum validTimeStart of all observation that belong to this offering. If the column is empty, the information is calculated during the cache update and stored locally. Used for the capabilities of the SOS.

column.name: valid_time_end
column.comment: The maximum validTimeEnd of all observation that belong to this offering. If the column is empty, the information is calculated during the cache update and stored locally. Used for the capabilities of the SOS.

column.name: geom
column.comment: The envelope/geometry of all features or samplingGeometries of observations that belong to this offering. If the column is empty, the information is calculated during the cache update and stored locally. Used for the capabilities of the SOS.

column.name: fk_child_offering_id
column.comment: Reference to the child offering in offering table.

column.name: fk_parent_offering_id
column.comment: Reference to the parent offering in offering table.

set.name: observationTypes
set.comment: Relation to store the valid observationTypes for the offering

column.name: fk_offering_id
column.comment: The related offering

column.name: fk_format_id
column.comment: The reference of the related observationType from the format table

set.name: featureTypes
set.comment: Relation to store the valid featureTypes for the offering

column.name: fk_offering_id
column.comment: The related offering

column.name: fk_format_id
column.comment: The reference of the related featureType from the format table

set.name: relatedFeatures
set.comment: Storage tfor the relation between offering and relatedFeature

column.name: fk_offering_id
column.comment: The related offering

column.name: fk_related_feature_id
column.comment: The reference to the relatedFeature from the relatedFeature table

column.name: offering_i18n_id
column.comment: PK column of the table

column.name: fk_offering_id
column.comment: Reference to the offering table this internationalization belongs to.

column.name: locale
column.comment: Locale/language specification for this entry. ISO 639 Codes (http://www.loc.gov/standards/iso639-2/php/code_list.php)

column.name: name
column.comment: Locale/language specific name of the offering

column.name: description
column.comment: Locale/language specific description of the offering
